column3: I don't think this constructor is used right now, so the compiler will probably wipe it and it should not make a difference for travis.\n
If it wasn't used, my new test (see #7728 ) shouldn't fail with this change either, but it does.\n
Good catch, this definitely needs a test\n
Indeed, it is used. Happy to review if you submit the patch for the tests.\n

I'm glad that this is helpful, the fix test is in #7728 (sorry, I opened the PR without paying attention to github, which was telling me I needed to rebase on top of #7705 ).\n\nI actually "wasted" much more time than expected on a draft branch to make a point that shouldn't have taken me much time because this test didn't exist. But what I did is kind of a long story with some embarrassing parts
